name: Taking Back Colors
description:
An ancient temple have an amazing ball but there are something behind the magic ball..... Now throw the ball and get back your colors!!

P.S: This is my first Game Jam piece and there are some knowing bugs not fixed due to game jam time manner. I played several time my own and should not have problem for anyone enjoy the whole game even though there are some bugs. I enjoyed create some cool particle effect and real-time animation for intro and ending the game. Hope you enjoy!
